name: Butterfly Polymerization
description:
W player key move up

S player key moves down

A player key moves left

D player key moves to the right.

Regain vigor: be on the leaf and press the button with the hand icon.

Recover Thirst: stand over a bottle cap and press the hand icon button.

Collect pollen: stand on a blooming flower and press the hand icon button.

Bloom the flower: stand on a flower bud, with full pollen, and press the hand icon button.
